Description: Postcard; printed paper; hand coloured real photograph showing buildings and moored boats at Port Said.
Producer name: Published by: Thomas of Fleet Street
Curator's comments: Real photo card; postally used. Message reads: "Dear Mum, Dad, Manda & Robin We have settled down on the boat quite well, and the food is exceptionally good. We are thoroughly enjoying all the sunshine and sea air and have already developed quite a tan. There is not an awful lot of life on the boat, but it is rather nice to be lazy. Love to everyone, George"
